long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Live Reload is a system to automatically reload a web page when the source files for that web page are changed. This extension connects to a live-reload server (local or remote) for example LiveReload (for Windows or Mac) or guard-livereload (for Linux). The extension tries to connect to a live reload server on the domain for the current web page.
